name: KP Hotel
address: 09 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, phường Tân An, quận Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở Cần Thơ, cách Bến Ninh Kiều 4 phút đi bộ, KP Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có khu vườn, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, sân hiên và nhà hàng. Với quầy bar, khách sạn nằm gần một số điểm tham quan nổi tiếng, cách Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Xuân Khánh 19 phút đi bộ, Bảo tàng Cần Thơ 600 m và Cầu đi bộ Ninh Kiều chưa đến 1 km. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Phòng khách ở khách sạn được trang bị ấm đun nước. Mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có điều hòa, két an toàn và TV màn hình phẳng, ngoài ra một số căn tại KP Hotel có ban công. Tại chỗ nghỉ, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng hằng ngày, gồm các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte và kiểu lục địa.

KP Hotel cách Vincom Plaza Hùng Vương 2.1 km và Can Tho Stadium 2.5 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cần Thơ, cách khách sạn 10 km.

review.comment_positive:
Hôtel très bien placé, à deux pas du marché et du quai pour aller sur le marché flottant.
Le petit déjeuner est copieux et varié, et il y a même du pain et des viennoiseries, ce qui peut être une bonne alternative si on ne souhaite pas un petit déjeuner vietnamien.
Tout le personnel est très gentil, attentif et efficace. La navette pour notre retour en bus à HCMV a été faite à la réception.
La chambre est très confortable.
Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour!

review.rating: near all centers - center of yummy food, bar. It’s near the river so that can we can have a morning run along the river.
Perfectly fine for a short functional no frills stay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: This is a perfectly good small hotel in Can Tho if you just need a functional base for a day or 2. the staff are pleasant and speak enough English to get by. The rooms have modern touches such as automatic curtain opening and light switches which are nice. Its a 5 minute walk to the Ninh Quay with all the food stalls and market and where to get the boats to Cai Rang. If you just need a cheap and functional base it’s fine. For our 2 nights stay to see the floating markets we didn’t need a pool or anything more fancy.
review.comment_negative: The shower leaked and the room whilst surface clean doesn’t appear to be deep cleaned as there were copious cobwebs and when you look closely at the walls and corners they are a bit tatty and dusty. The balcony chairs don’t have seat cushions so are pretty uncomfortable. They make you sign a form at check in saying you won’t bring smelly durian fruit or similar into the room - probably more aimed at Asian guests which the hotel primarily seems to cater for ( the breakfast is entirely Asian ) or they will charge you 100% extra. Fair as the smell of durian is awful and lingers for ages but weird!!

review.comment_positive:
Staff
Location 
Sorry but that’s where it stops
review.comment_negative:
This hotel would look great and could be a nice hotel if the maintenance was kept up to date and some cleaning and time and effort was put in 
Tried to do all mod cons but nothing works properly or maintained (not like the photos)
The staff were helpful and polite but that’s about it 
Light in bathroom didn’t work 
Stains all on curtain’s 
Vent falling out of ceiling 
had to replace fridge for us as didn’t work 
Tv didn’t work properly took them 45 minutes and phone a friend still only got 1 channel
And the carpet in the halls of each level badly stained looked horrible to see stains when going to and from elevator to room 
Toilet gurgling all night 
Fantastic shower head but needed cleaning as didn’t work properly holes all blocked 
Balcony door didn’t lock 
You get what you pay for I know 
It’s a great location But have stayed at places for equal the cost and a lot better 
We stayed 1 night 
Sorry KP but you could be great with a bit of effort

review.comment_positive:
The room was we aspected, nothing extra special but very modern and clean. we didn’t need any help but staff was very service minded, so I think they could help you with the most. The breakfast was included for us (don’t know if it is for everyone) and where very fresh and had a few dishes and fresh made juice. good to know is that every room doesn’t have a window, so double check if it’s important for you.

The street is quiet and offers a few restaurants, coffee shops and bars.

best regards/ Silvia

review.comment_negative:
Der Service. Es gab morgens beim
Buffet Sandwiches, wir fragten ob wir einen Morgen jeder ein Sandwich nach der morgendlichen Tour bekommen könnten, es war nicht möglich. Direkt am Abend vorzubestellen um pünktlich um 6.30 Uhr Frühstück zu bekommen ohne zu warten, war auch nicht möglich. Personal im Restaurant hat lieber selbst gefrühstückt (es schien Schichtbeginn), als die Gäste zu bedienen oder abzuräumen. Der E-Roller war am Abend fast leer und wir haben drum gebeten, dass sie diesen doch bitte laden mögen damit wir nach der Dusche weiterfahren können. Obwohl man uns dies bestätigte, wurde der Roller nicht geladen. Am Tag der Abreise war man schon dabei das Zimmer aufzuräumen (7 Uhr morgens) bevor wir ausgecheckt haben, dann wollte man uns noch eine Cola in Rechnung stellen, welche wir nicht getrunken hatten. 

Zimmer (mit Absicht ohne Fenster, da wir mit Licht oder Lärm mitten in der Stadt nicht schlafen würden) waren trotzdem hell, denn der Spalt der Tür war so groß, dass das Zimmer gut hell war…

review.rating: Problème d'humidité et petit déjeuner mauvais
review.comment_positive: Bien localisé. Hall d'entrée joli et petit jardin au milieu des chambres d'hôtel du cinquième étage. Grand balcon et chambre spacieuse.
review.comment_negative:
Grand balcon totalement vide avec quelques plantes en pot desséchées. Pas de table ni de chaises. Chambre très humide avec problème d'infiltration, mauvaise odeur et douche bouchée (comme il n'y a pas de bac de douche, l'eau s'écoule dans toute la salle de bain). Chambre pas très propre. 

Nous avions payé pour le petit déjeuner mais faute de clients, le petit déjeuner a été annulé (pas de remboursement). Nous avons eu le droit seulement à une soupe vide et un jus de fruit. Mauvaise surprise, le jus de fruit a dû être payé en supplément! Pourtant nous avions payé notre forfait petit déjeuner... 

La chambre ressemble un peu à un pré-fabriqué.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Room was clean. Very comfortable bed.
review.comment_negative:
When I checked in I was told the entire hotel was out of power until the evening. If the hotel had contacted me in advance, I would have adjusted my time and checked in after the power was restored. 
After check-in, I asked for a room change or an early check-in for my next reservation, but both were refused on the grounds that the hotel was fully booked. However, I was told that at breakfast, there were not many guests staying and it would be by order only but not buffet. I don't know which is true, but the receptionist didn't seem to want to do anything about it and immediately answered that the hotel was fully booked, which I didn't feel right about.
Breakfast was simple, not much compared to other hotels in the same class, and there were few choices.
The shower temperature was not stable, and many times it suddenly became hot and almost scalding.
Overall, the reception was not very helpful, although I guess it depends on who is at the reception. (One person was very good though). If asked if I would stay there again, I probably would not.

review.rating: A very nice hotel centrally-located for a pleasant stay in Can Tho
review.comment_positive:
The KP hotel is nicely situated very near the Can Tho boat pier, the central market area and also the night market, with numerous eating establishments in the local vicinity.

Apart from one initial disappointment, we found overall the KP hotel to be a superb establishment.

Our room was immaculately appointed and was very comfortable.

Breakfast was a buffet (or from an a-le-carte menu, if only a few guests were staying). The range of food was slightly biased to Far-East Asian tastes, though freshly cooked-to-order eggs were available for those preferring more Western style food.

The staff at this hotel are excellent - friendly, polite, eager to help, and very competent. Whether it be the conceige, reception, breakfast or housekeeping staff, they were all excellent, but we must highlight one member of staff- Jenny Mo - who worked wonders on our behalf. We presented Jenny with our 'little' problem of how to get from Can Tho to Ca Mau (a 4-hour drive by bus) and she said she could arrange everything for us. We returned to the hotel a couple of hours later to find everything arranged (including the bus company collecting us from our hotel) - well done, Jenny, your arrangements were to perfection.
review.comment_negative:
We had one initial shock and disappointment on first entering our allocated room - there was NO window - four nicely decorated walls, but no window!!! As we had just taken the last available room, we were unable to organise an upgrade to a windowed room. The norm these days is for the hotel to state that there would be no window either in the hotel description on the booking.com website, or when confirming a room booking. Neither occurred with our booking. Never-the-less, having overcome the initial disappointment of no window, we did enjoy our 3-day stay.

The was a very large modern electronic safety box in the room for our valuables, etc, and the room itself was protected by an electronic key card door lock. However this safety box was able to migrate about the room as it was not bolted to either the walls or the furniture. At least we didn't have to worry about the box expectedly falling out of our window!!!

review.rating: Couteux, aucun service, désagréable et malhonnête
review.comment_positive: La situation en centre ville
review.comment_negative:
personnel désagréable et malhonnête.
La salle de bain était sale et remplie d'insectes et je l'ai nettoyée avec une serviette. On m'a facturé le nettoyage de la serviette et fait du chantage : pas de facture si je ne payais pas. La chambre de mon collègue était aussi infestée. Nous avions pourtant pris les chambres les plus chères !!!
J'ai protesté, la réceptionniste n'a pas voulu appelé le manager et m'a simplement dit "I can't stand you" et menacé d'appeler la police. J'ai dû appeler mes collègues vietnamiens pour qu'on me sorte de ce chantage. Je suis un habitué du Vietnam, je n'ai jamais vu ça. Et le petit déjeuner est en-dessous de tout et le wifi très faible
A ne pas recommander et c'est la première fois que je dois écrire un tel avis négatif

review.comment_positive: ok

This hotel is very central in Can Tho.
On the upper end of the price range but very comfortable.
Our family suite is large, very modern, but it suffers from a lack of a proper wall.
The room is separated by partitions especially the family suites, and the partitions are no more than particle boards hence one can hear every minute conversations of your neighbors. 
Not much street noise aside from neighboring room noise, as such I used ear plugs.
Breakfast is good and because it has a restaurant, the coffee is excellent.
Staff is helpful although when booking tours, make sure to confirm proper prices.

Tóc dưới bàn để tivi, kế bên thùng rác, và 2 đôi dép 1 đen 1 xám thâm + dài! Ngoài ban công tàn thuốc vương vãi. Bàn làm việc ở gần phía đầu giường, hướng nhìn thẳng qua tường tivi sẽ tốt hơn, sẽ không cản lối ra ban công khi partner làm việc, phòng sẽ rộng lối đi hơn.

review.comment_positive: The breakfast was very nice with various types of Vietnam Southwest local foods. The staff were extremely friendly. The hotel is located at the city center, which is convenient for you to travel around, especially for sightseeing at the Ninh Kieu River Park.

review.rating: A perfect stay in Can Tho!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff was great! We went early to Mekong Delta, therefor we would have skipped the breakfast, but the staff was willing to put some things aside for us, which was so thoughtful from them. The room was very clean, in a very good location - close to the centre, away from the main street. Our room had windows towards the street, but did not hear too much traffic inside. Bathroom had a lot of space and amazing shower. The AC worked very well and was quiet. So I would give 9/10, and this 1 is really only missing because it took like a minute or two for the warm water to arrive.
review.comment_negative: If to complain about anything, then it took awhile for warm water to come. But shower overall was amazing!

They insisted on additional payment when checking out and stopped our taxi leaving on time. That should just be laundry. Staff doesn't speak English and not their fault as just following process. We paid an extra 150 so could leave and get our bus in time. Bad vibes.

review.rating: Non fatevi abbindolare! È una guest house, non un hotel di lusso!
review.comment_positive: Buona posizione vicino al fiume e alle barche dei pescatori che la mattina portano a fare il tour del mercato.
review.comment_negative:
Camere molto più brutte di come appaiono in fotografia. Sembra un hotel di lusso ma è in realtà poco più di una guest house. Pessima manutenzione delle camere. Scarsa pulizia della stanza (a parte le lenzuola che erano molto pulite). Stanza rumorosa e illuminata dal corridoio attraverso porta a vetri priva di tenda. La stanza non ha pareti in muratura ma pannelli di plastica che la dividono dalle altre stanze, per cui si sentono i vicini parlare anche se non alzano pa voce.
Non serve colazione dopo le 9.30 o prima delle 6.30 (peccato che quasi tutte le escursioni sono dalle 5.30 alle 9.30!

Après 8 h le matin les plats du petit déjeuner ne sont pas remplis. J'ai vu une famille repartir en voyant ce qui était à leur disposition pour le petit déjeuner.
Nous avons demandé les renseignements pour louer une motobike à essence, d'après la personne de l'accueil pas de problème il suffisait de demander et 15 min après la moto arrivait. Sauf que bien sûr il n'y avait plus du tout de moto en procédant de cette manière. Il a fallu que nous cherchions seuls sans même de renseignements sur l'endroit où nous pourrions trouver ! Il vaut donc mieux réserver en payant la veille.

 For 3 people when we were 4. They said the hotel was booked but I saw on booking other rooms were available. The breakfast is until 9:30 am but at 8:30 it was empty and they didn’t stock up. We flew into Can tho especially to see the floating market . We took the tour for the floating market with the hotel. We wanted the busy market where all the tourists go but the hotel tour brought us to the sad local one with not a lot of boats. Very disappointed. I spent a lot of money and didn’t see what I wanted to see. The guide was kind and sweet.

review.comment_positive: Chương trình ca nhạc chào năm mới của khách sạn rất sôi động và được đầu tư công phu.
The hotel was located in the center and close to everything. There are restaurants within walking distance, as well as the port where you take the boat tour to the Cai Rang Floating Market.
review.comment_negative: The room listing on Booking.com was not accurate. I've booked the Standard Double Room and to my surprise, THE ROOM DOES NOT HAVE A WINDOW! This was not stated on the booking at all. Also, I requested a later check out, and the hotel agreed to 1 pm. However, on check out day, the power was cut off at 12:30pm so I was forced to use my flash light to pack my stuff. It was nuisance given there is no window in the room.

Location really good close to night market and foods
However it doesn’t look like pictures in real life
Many faulty parts in the room and not very clean at well
First 2 days is good then next 3 days not really good anymore. Asked for an extra towel and staffs asked me to pay for cleaning service ( not much but weird when you have to pay for an extra towel) some staffs are nice but reception acting a bit weird on the day we check out ( few like she try to make us live early)
